description: This is professional internship module lasting a minimum of 24 weeks. The minimum number of hours of work is set at 900 hours.
title: Business Internship III
prerequisite:
BBA students should have completed:
• at least 60 MCs of taught modules
• at least one Career Starter Workshops (STR) modules.

BBA(Accountancy) students should have completed:
• ACC2707 Corporate Accounting and Reporting I
• ACC3701 Assurance and Attestation
• ACC3703 Taxation

BSc (Real Estate) students should have completed:
• 100 MCs or 6 semesters of studies
